meanings.definition: The process of forming a cheesy or chalky substance in a tissue, typically due to tuberculosis.
meanings.sent1: The caseation in the lung tissue was a sign of advanced tuberculosis.
meanings.sent2: Doctors identified the caseation in the tissue as a result of the infection.
meanings.sent3: The cheesy caseation in the tissue made the doctors grimace.
meanings.sent4: The caseation spread through the tissue like a slow, destructive force.
meanings.sent5: The chalky caseation in the tissue was a stark reminder of the disease's progression.

meanings.definition: The act of becoming or causing to become caseous.
meanings.sent1: The caseation of the tissue was a concerning development.
meanings.sent2: The veterinarian explained the caseation of the wound to the pet owner.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected caseation of the cheese left everyone puzzled.
meanings.sent4: The caseation of the relationship slowly eroded their bond.
meanings.sent5: The caseation of the milk turned it into a solid mass.
